snippet: “A Beautiful Day in November on the Banks of the Greatest of the Great Lakes,” a comedy by Kate Benson, transforms a Thanksgiving dinner into a competitive sport.
abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews Kate Benson Play A Beautiful Day in November on the Banks of the Greatest of the Great Lakes, directed by Lee Sunday Evans at City Center Stage II; Brooke Ishibashi, Heather Alicia Simms and Nina Hellman star.
lead_paragraph: “A Beautiful Day in November on the Banks of the Greatest of the Great Lakes,” a comedy by Kate Benson, transforms a Thanksgiving dinner into a competitive sport.

headline.seo: ‘A Beautiful Day in November’ Opens at City Center
headline.kicker: Theater Review | 'A Beautiful Day in November'
